changelog.md.Pour rappel s'il n'y a pas d'information: As a reminder if there is no information on the update, it means that it only concerns the updating of documentation, translation or text

index.md.Ce plugin permet d'établir et de récupér: This plugin allows you to establish and retrieve information from the Ewattch supervisor
index.md.Après téléchargement du plugin il vous f: After downloading the plugin you need to activate it, you then have access to the basic configuration of the plugin
